Interface CurrencypairJpaRepository

    • findByIdTenantAndIdWatchlistWhenRetryIntraThan0

      @Query("SELECT c FROM Watchlist w JOIN w.securitycurrencyList c\nWHERE w.idTenant = ?1 AND w.idWatchlist = ?2 AND c.retryIntraLoad > 0\nAND c.fromCurrency IS NOT NULL AND c.idConnectorIntra IS NOT NULL") List<Currencypair> findByIdTenantAndIdWatchlistWhenRetryIntraThan0(Integer idTenant, Integer idWatchlist)
      Fetches currency pairs in the specified tenant’s watchlist that need an intraday reload (retryIntraLoad > 0) and have a configured intraday connector.
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID
      idWatchlist - the watchlist ID
      Returns:
      list of currency pairs pending intraday update

    • findWithConnectorByIdTenantAndIdWatchlistWhenRetryHistoryGreaterThan0

      @Query("SELECT c as securityCurrency, MAX(h.date) AS date FROM Watchlist w JOIN w.securitycurrencyList c JOIN c.historyquoteList h\nWHERE w.idTenant = ?1 AND w.idWatchlist = ?2 AND c.retryHistoryLoad > 0 AND c.fromCurrency IS NOT NULL\nAND c.idConnectorHistory IS NOT NULL GROUP BY c.idSecuritycurrency") List<SecurityCurrencyMaxHistoryquoteData<Currencypair>> findWithConnectorByIdTenantAndIdWatchlistWhenRetryHistoryGreaterThan0(Integer idTenant, Integer idWatchlist)
      Retrieves the latest quote date for each currency pair in the specified watchlist that is scheduled for a historical data reload (retryHistoryLoad > 0) and has an attached history connector.
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID owning the watchlist
      idWatchlist - the watchlist ID
      Returns:
      a list of SecurityCurrencyMaxHistoryquoteData projections containing:
      • securityCurrency: the Currencypair entity
      • date: the most recent quote date from historyquoteList

    • getCurrencypairInTransactionByTenant

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Currencypair> getCurrencypairInTransactionByTenant(Integer idTenant)
      Gel all used currency pairs in transactions. That means currency pairs between security cash accounts.

    • getSecurityTransactionCurrenciesForTenantExclude

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) Set<String> getSecurityTransactionCurrenciesForTenantExclude(Integer idTenant, String excludeCurrency)
      Retrieves distinct security currencies that have been transacted by the specified tenant, excluding the given currency.
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID whose transaction currencies are fetched
      excludeCurrency - the currency code to exclude from the results
      Returns:
      a set of security currency codes transacted by the tenant, excluding excludeCurrency

    • getSecurityTransactionCurrenciesForPortfolioExclude

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) Set<String> getSecurityTransactionCurrenciesForPortfolioExclude(Integer idPortfolio, String excludCurrency)
      Retrieves distinct security currencies that have been transacted in the specified portfolio, excluding the given currency.
      Parameters:
      idPortfolio - the portfolio ID whose transaction currencies are fetched
      excludeCurrency - the currency code to exclude from the results
      Returns:
      a set of security currency codes transacted in the portfolio, excluding excludeCurrency

    • getCurrencypairInTransactionByPortfolioId

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Currencypair> getCurrencypairInTransactionByPortfolioId(Integer idPortfolio, Integer idTenant)
      Retrieves all currency pairs that have been used in transactions for the specified portfolio (and scoped by tenant).
      Parameters:
      idPortfolio - the portfolio ID whose transaction currency pairs are fetched
      idTenant - the tenant ID to which the portfolio belongs
      Returns:
      a list of Currencypair entities used in the portfolio’s transactions

    • getAllIdOfEmptyHistorqute

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> getAllIdOfEmptyHistorqute()
      Retrieves the IDs of all currency pairs that have no historyquote records and have retry count below the global retry threshold.
      Returns:
      a list of Currencypair IDs with empty historyquote and eligible for retry

    • getAllCurrencypairsForTenantByTenant

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Currencypair> getAllCurrencypairsForTenantByTenant(Integer idTenant)
      Retrieves every distinct currency pair needed to convert assets into the tenant’s base currency.

      This includes:

      • Pairs converting each security’s native currency (from security transactions) to the tenant currency.
      • Pairs converting each cash account’s currency to the tenant currency.
      • Any currency pairs directly recorded in transaction entries.
      Identity pairs (where from_currency == to_currency) are excluded.
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID whose conversion currency pairs are fetched
      Returns:
      a list of distinct Currencypair entities used across the tenant’s portfolios, cash accounts, and transactions

    • getAllCurrencypairsForPortfolioByPortfolio

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Currencypair> getAllCurrencypairsForPortfolioByPortfolio(Integer idPortfolio)
      Retrieves every distinct currency pair required to convert portfolio holdings into the portfolio’s base currency.

      Combines:

      • Security context: for each security held in the portfolio (via transactions), converting security.currency to portfolio.currency.
      • Cash account context: for each cash account under the portfolio, converting cashaccount.currency to portfolio.currency.
      Unions results from both contexts and returns matching Currencypair entities linked with their Securitycurrency metadata.
      Parameters:
      idPortfolio - the portfolio ID whose currency pairs are required for valuation
      Returns:
      a list of distinct Currencypair entities used by the portfolio’s securities and cash accounts

    • getPairsByFromAndToCurrency

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Currencypair> getPairsByFromAndToCurrency(List<String> currencyPairConcat)
      Finds all currency pairs matching any concatenated "from+to" currency codes in the provided list.
      Parameters:
      currencyPairConcat - a list of concatenated currency codes (e.g., "USDCHF")
      Returns:
      a list of matching Currencypair entities

    • findByFromCurrencyAndToCurrencyOrToCurrencyAndFromCurrency

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Currencypair> findByFromCurrencyAndToCurrencyOrToCurrencyAndFromCurrency(String c1, String c2)
      Finds the currency pair entity for the given two currencies, in either direction.
      Parameters:
      c1 - the first currency code
      c2 - the second currency code
      Returns:
      a list of matching Currencypair entities where (from=c1, to=c2) or (from=c2, to=c1)

    • getAllCurrencypairsByTenantInPortfolioAndAccounts

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Currencypair> getAllCurrencypairsByTenantInPortfolioAndAccounts(Integer idTenant)
      For a tenant it gets all used currency pairs of all accounts and securities, without the currency pairs used in transactions. The main currency is taken from the tenant. TODO it does not work correctly for HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryImpl
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID whose currency pairs are fetched
      Returns:
      a list of Currencypair entities used within the tenant’s holdings

    • countCurrencyGroupByCurrency

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<CurrencyCount> countCurrencyGroupByCurrency(Set<String> currencies)
      Counts how many times each currency appears in the 'from' or 'to' side of currency pairs, limited to the given set of currency codes.
      Parameters:
      currencies - a set of currency codes to count usage for
      Returns:
      a list of CurrencyCount projections with currency and usage count

    • getAllCurrencypairsByPortfolioInPortfolioAndAccounts

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Currencypair> getAllCurrencypairsByPortfolioInPortfolioAndAccounts(Integer idPortfolio)
      Retrieves every currency pair needed to convert both security positions and cash balances into the portfolio’s base currency for the specified portfolio.

      This includes:

      • Pairs from security transactions: converting each security’s native currency (security.currency) to the portfolio currency.
      • Pairs from cash accounts: converting each cash account’s currency to the portfolio currency.
      The method unions results from both contexts and returns distinct Currencypair entities joined with their Securitycurrency metadata.
      Parameters:
      idPortfolio - the portfolio ID whose security and cash-account currency pairs are fetched
      Returns:
      a list of distinct Currencypair entities used within the portfolio’s holdings

    • getMaxHistoryquote

      @Query(nativeQuery=false) List<SecurityCurrencyMaxHistoryquoteData<Currencypair>> getMaxHistoryquote(short maxHistoryRetry)
      Retrieves the maximum historyquote date for each currency pair that has retryHistoryLoad below the given threshold and a non-null connector history setting.
      Parameters:
      maxHistoryRetry - the maximum retryHistoryLoad value to consider
      Returns:
      a list of SecurityCurrencyMaxHistoryquoteData projections containing the currency pair and its latest quote date

    • getHoldCashaccountOutDatetedCurrencypairs

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<Currencypair> getHoldCashaccountOutDatetedCurrencypairs()
      Retrieves currency pairs whose cash‐account deposit holds are stale compared to market quotes.

      Identifies pairs where a deposit or withdrawal (transaction_type ≤ DEPOSIT) occurred in a cash account whose currency differs from the portfolio or tenant base currency, and where the corresponding `hold_cashaccount_deposit.valid_timestamp` is earlier than the `historyquote.create_modify_time`.

      • Portfolio context: converts cash‐account currency to the portfolio currency.
      • Tenant context: converts cash‐account currency to the tenant currency.
      These pairs require refreshing hold‐based cash valuations against the latest end‐of‐day rates.
      Returns:
      a list of Currencypair entities for which deposit hold records are out‐of‐date
